meanings.definition: The act of kissing or embracing.
meanings.sent1: Their osculation was a tender moment of affection.
meanings.sent2: The couple's osculation at the airport melted the hearts of onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The movie scene featured an osculation that made the audience swoon.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist captured the essence of love through osculation.
meanings.sent5: The osculation between the parent and child was a symbol of their bond.

meanings.definition: The contact or touching of two curves or surfaces at a point.
meanings.sent1: The osculation of the circles created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent2: The osculation of the gears ensured smooth operation.
meanings.sent3: The osculation of the hills in the distance made the landscape picturesque.
meanings.sent4: The osculation of the waves against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The osculation of the planets in the night sky was a celestial dance.
